name: Palindromes in base 10 in which the difference between the sums of the digits in the even and odd positions is zero.
link: Index entries for sequences related to palindromes.
mathematica: Select[11 * Range[0, 500], PalindromeQ[#] && Total[IntegerDigits[#][[1 ;; -1 ;; 2]]] == Total[IntegerDigits[#][[2 ;; -1 ;; 2]]] &] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 22 2025 *)
author: _Alexander Yutkin_, Mar 22 2025
